titleStmt.title: At the court at Whitehall, the 29th day of December, 1694 By the Lords of His Majesties most honourable Privy Council.
Orders in Council. 1694-12-29
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Privy Council.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Charles Bill, and the executrix of Thomas Newcomb, deceas'd; printers to the Kings most excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: "For making the necessary alterations in the Prayer Book on the death of Queen Mary. ... Alterations from King and Queen to King, &c., to be made in Morning and Evening Prayers, Litany, ... Alterations to be made with a pen till new editions are printed." -- Steele.
Reproduction of original in the Lambeth Palace Library.

person.persName: Charles Bill, and the executrix of Thomas Newcomb, deceas'd;
